sub_fields.label: Featured Image Override
sub_fields.name: featured_image
sub_fields.instructions: Uploaded image should have an aspect ratio of 3:2

sub_fields.label: Category Name Override
sub_fields.name: category_title
sub_fields.instructions: If filled out, this will override the category name displayed above the conten title.

sub_fields.label: Content Title Override
sub_fields.name: content_title_override
sub_fields.instructions: If you want to use a title that's different from this article's title, add it here!

sub_fields.label: Collection
sub_fields.name: collection
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a collection. Add a collection under collections

sub_fields.label: Series title (override tag name)
sub_fields.name: series_title
sub_fields.instructions: This will replace the tag name.

sub_fields.label: Council title (override tag name)
sub_fields.name: series_title
sub_fields.instructions: This will replace the tag name.

sub_fields.label: Description Override
sub_fields.name: description_override
sub_fields.instructions: This will override the post/page excerpt

sub_fields.label: Feature Header Image
sub_fields.name: feature_header_image
sub_fields.instructions: Image to display in the circle header of the feature card

sub_fields.label: Featured Title
sub_fields.name: featured_title
sub_fields.instructions: Text to be displayed immediately below the header image

sub_fields.label: Post Image ( Override )
sub_fields.name: post_image_override
sub_fields.instructions: If uploaded, this image will override the post's featured image

sub_fields.message: Displays your 6 most recent posts selected in the Social Posts plugin
Displays the 3 most popular posts. You can globally configure the component on Theme Options > Trending Articles.
